You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesF F] > &fcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Fcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0424/index.htm U+00424].
  * `&fcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0444/index.htm U+00444].
